newsitem.title: NIGERIA: 10 drown in Nigerian boat accident.
newsitem.headline: 10 drown in Nigerian boat accident.

text.p: Ten people drowned on Wednesday when their boat capsized in the Bonny River off the southeastern Nigerian state of Rivers, newspapers reported on Thursday.
They said the victims were passengers travelling to Bonny town from the oil city of Port Harcourt.
The cause of the accident was not clear. Boat accidents are common in Nigeria where many vessels have no radios to call for help.
